attributes.action: work with the police service to get more police out of their offices and onto the streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With a rise in anti-social behaviour and petty crime, particularly in poorer areas of Britain, the time for gimmicks and quick-fix policies is over.

Heavier police presence in these deprived areas would not only make people feel safer and more confident in their own neighbourhoods - as they should - but would also be a good opportunity for the Prime Minister to demonstrate that he does actually still listen to the people who elected him, and care about the issues that matter most to them.

A cut down in paperwork and a rise in the number of support officers would be a good start.
